#Text=EFFERVESCING CHELTENHAM SALTS,

#Text=Thompsons Montpellier Spas at Cheltenham
#Text=TH E Public are respectfully informed that these Salts are the only genuine production of the Cheltenham Spa Waters, a fact which is well known to every person who has visited (Cheltenham.
#Text=They contain according to the Analysis of Sir Humphrey Davy, and Messrs.

#Text=Brande and Parkcs, all the Chalybeate and other essential properties of the Spa Waters at Cheltenham. _ These Salts possess an effervescing principle, and in this respect differ only fro:u the Cheltenham Salts hitherto sold to the Public.
#Text=The Heat.
#Text=Cheltenham Salts in Crystals and Efflorescence, as wdl as the above, are to be had of the Sole Agents, Messrs.

#Text=BUTLER, Chemists, Cheapside, Corner St Paul’*, London ; Sackville-street, Dublin ; and Princes-street, Edinburgh ;--retail of the principal Medicine Venders, and at the Montpellier 1 ump Room, Cheltenham.
#Text=Caution.
#Text=—ln future the above Cheltenham Salts cannot be genuine unless the Government stamp with the words 44 Butler, -CiiEAPsiDt,’’ is attached to them.

#Text=There stood in the room then a high-polish’d Boot, In which \\V,.Rnr,N-s Jet of pre-eminent hue Display’d the line forms of reflection to view.— Now seizing poor Puss, to the bright Boot he bore her, (The Monkey, her shadow then gleaming before her,) And answer’d her struggles with chatter aud blows, Her phi: while he soapd from her ears to her * osa !
#Text=The Cal, thus essaying in vain at resistance.
#Text=And mewing, in pitiful plaint, for assistance.

#Text=The method of shaving, how best to attain it.
#Text=The act interspersing with grin and grimace, The Ape cleard the Cal of each hair on her face ; And strange though it seems, yet the frolicsome elf Was mneb more successful on Puts than himself.
